name: Jumpkin Bob
description:
Jumpkin Bob is a game where you are a pumpkin, and his name is Bob. You need to help Bob escape the haunted house before the 80 seconds.

If you don't escape, you lose.

This was made for the 8th One Minute Game Jam.

Fun fact: This is my first ever game jam! And also my first ever game I released on Itch.io

Have fun!

This was made by: Headphones Headache, Taki_Wacky and Eli Sung.
